long_description: Whether you're admiring the view from the Seattle Space Needle or the Eiffel Tower, the women's KAVU Seattle Sling holds all you need for the day-your phone, passport, wallet and snacks. Zippered cell phone pocket on the adjustable shoulder strap lets you get to your phone fast. 3 external zip pockets and a patch pocket hold lots of gear. Internal organization pockets and key clip keep every little thing in its place. The women's KAVU Seattle Sling is made of sturdy cotton and comes in a variety of colors and patterns. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're admiring the view from the Seattle Space Needle or the Eiffel Tower, the women's KAVU Seattle Sling holds all you need for the day-your phone, passport, wallet and snacks.
